entry.summary: .Potential Tropical Cyclone One is forecast to move northeast towards the southern Florida peninsula through late week. This system is expected to bring locally heavy rainfall amounts of four to six inches with locally higher amounts. The heavy rainfall may produce flooding along creeks and rivers and in urban, poor drainage and low lying areas.
